original_text: He had been quarreling with the people of Tyre and Sidon; they now joined together and sought an audience with him. After securing the support of Blastus, a trusted personal servant of the king, they asked for peace, because they depended on the king’s country for their food supply.
korean_text: 헤롯이 두로와 시돈 사람들을 대단히 노여워하니 그들의 지방이 왕국에서 나는 양식을 먹는 까닭에 한마음으로 그에게 나아와 왕의 침소 맡은 신하 블라스도를 설득하여 화목하기를 청한지라

sentences.original_text: He had been quarreling with the people of Tyre and Sidon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두로와 시돈 사람들과 다투고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and sought an audience with him
After securing the support of Blastus
a trusted personal servant of the king
because they depended on the king's country
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 왕의 나라에 의존하고 있었기 때문이다
